import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Docs/Theme/Colors" />

export const ColorBox = ({ name, className }) => {
  return (
    <div>
      <p className="mb-2 text-gray-10">{name}</p>
      <div className={[className, 'h-10 rounded-md shadow-xl'].join(' ')} />
    </div>
  )
}

export const ColorSection = ({ title, colors }) => {
  return (
    <div className="pb-2">
      <h1 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-10">
        {title}
      </h1>
      <div className="grid grid-cols-5 gap-4">
        {colors.map((color) => {
          return (
            <ColorBox
              key={color}
              name={color.replace('bg-', '')}
              className={color}
            />
          )
        })} </div>
    </div>
  );
}
